data.title: Cherry Creek Careers
data.text:
Starting teacher salary - Beginning in the 2023-24* school year, the starting annual salary was $57,000 for new teachers to the District. The adopted salary schedule raised salaries for more experienced teachers and provided compensation for teachers and certified staff who further their education. For more information about salary placement, visit the Certified Salary Placement page.

Use our licensed salary calculator to find your estimated salary.

*Once negotiations for the 2024-25 school year are complete, the schedule and calculator will be updated to reflect any adjustments.

Classified Employee Referral Program - Are you a current employee who wants to refer a candidate to a Classified position within our District? Click here to learn about how you could earn a $500 referral bonus!
